summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Advanced SEO UI page in Admin Dashboard. Fixed bug in social post generation API (422 error). All 5 tabs working correctly: Internal Linking, Social Distribution, Trending Keywords, Backlink Opportunities, Multi-Language.

minor.issue: Was returning 422 error due to platforms parameter type mismatch. Fixed by changing List[str] to comma-separated string parsing.

integration_issues.issue: Was sending JSON body when API only accepts query params. Fixed by removing body from fetch request.

issues: MUI Grid deprecation warnings for 'item', 'xs', 'md', 'lg', 'sm' props - should update to Grid v2 API

action_items: Consider updating MUI Grid components to v2 API to remove console warnings
critical_code_review_comments: Advanced SEO page uses proper data-testid attributes for testing
All tabs load data correctly via API calls with admin authentication
Social post generation creates draft posts for Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook with appropriate formatting per platform
Trending keywords tab shows regional data with flags, trend scores, volume, competition, and growth rates
Backlink opportunities shows domain authority scores and suggested outreach methods
Multi-language tab tracks content counts per language (English, German, Swahili) with coverage percentages
context_for_next_testing_agent: Advanced SEO UI page fully functional. Bug fixed in social post generation endpoint (platforms parameter type). 2 blog posts available for testing social distribution. Trending keywords use simulated regional data. Backlink opportunities show real domain names with DA scores.

tabs.name: Internal Linking
features: Empty state message when no suggestions

tabs.name: Social Distribution
features: Generated posts dialog with Copy buttons

tabs.name: Trending Keywords
features: Table with 20 keywords showing region, trend score, volume, competition, growth

tabs.name: Backlink Opportunities
features: Cards showing domain, DA score, type, region, contact method, difficulty level

tabs.name: Multi-Language
features: Language Coverage Status cards (English active, German/Swahili planned)
Technical SEO Status (hreflang, language selector UI)

bugs_fixed.issue: platforms parameter was List[str] type which caused 422 when receiving comma-separated query string
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed to str type and parse comma-separated values with split(',')

bugs_fixed.issue: generateSocialPosts was sending JSON body in addition to query params
bugs_fixed.fix: Removed body from fetch request since all params are in query string
